bug.author: xhoong
bug.summary: ND4S: Missing beta release JAR in Maven
bug.description: Hi, when I try to grab Nd4s on 1.0.0-beta2 from Maven, it complains that the resources is not found, and apparently from <denchmark-link:https://mvnrepository.com/artifact/org.nd4j/nd4s>https://mvnrepository.com/artifact/org.nd4j/nd4s</denchmark-link> only alpha release for 1.0.0 is published. Can the beta (beta2 and beta3) binaries be published as well? Thanks. Aha! Link: <denchmark-link:https://skymindai.aha.io/features/ND4J-91>https://skymindai.aha.io/features/ND4J-91</denchmark-link>

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/xhoong>@xhoong</denchmark-link> Thanks for reporting this. It looks like this got missed in the release somehow; we'll look at getting that online shortly.
We'll need to remove methods that refer to IComplexNumber before we can release it...
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/xhoong>@xhoong</denchmark-link> just want to let you know that nd4s, artifacts are present on oss nexus already.
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/sshepel>@sshepel</denchmark-link> Awesome, can we close this issue?
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/saudet>@saudet</denchmark-link> how about to wait till next release, to not forget to check if nd4s artifact is in place :)
